alert.note: Alert for Noxubee (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 13 at 2:36PM CDT until July 19 at 4:45AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson MS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Mississippi... Noxubee River At Macon affecting Noxubee County. For the Tennesse-Tombigbee River ...including Tibbee, Stennis Lock & Dam, Columbus, Macon...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Noxubee River At Macon. * WHEN...Until early Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 32.0 feet, Water surrounds sewage lagoon west of Macon; however, access road is not blocked. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:00 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 21.5 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage late this afternoon to 31.4 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall early tomorrow afternoon. It will rise to 31.7 feet early Sunday afternoon. - Flood stage is 28.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 31.8 feet on 02/05/2016. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Noxubee River Macon 28.0 21.5 Thu 2 pm CDT 28.7 31.3 31.7 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued tonight at 9 PM CDT.
